com.ibm.team.repository.common
Interface IItemType

All Superinterfaces:
IType
public interface IItemType
extends IType

Represents a type of item found on the server. The items types include both auditable items (teams, contributors, workspaces, etc.), versionable items (files, folders) and simple items.

Since:
0.5

isAuditable

boolean isAuditable()
Returns whether this item type is an auditable item type.

Returns:
true if this is an auditable item type, and false otherwise

Returns:

Returns:

boolean isPublic()
Returns whether items of this type can be read by everyone.

Returns:
true if the item type has a Public read access policy; false otherwise

createItem

IItem createItem()
Creates a new item of this item type. The resulting item can be edited and saved to the repository as opposed to a read-only item.

Returns:
the created item or null if this item type is an invalid item type whose corresponding instance class is not an item class.

createItem

IItem createItem(java.lang.Object origin)
Creates a new item of this item type. The resulting item can be edited and saved to the repository as opposed to a read-only item. Method will also assign the given origin to the item.

Parameters:
origin - The item's origin; must not be null
Returns:
the created item or null if this item type is an invalid item type whose corresponding instance class is not an item class.

createItemHandle

IItemHandle createItemHandle(UUID itemId,
                             UUID optionalStateId)
Creates a new item handle of this item type, item id, and optional state id. The result records the item type, item id, and state if supplied.

Parameters:
itemId - the item id; must not be null
optionalStateId - the state id, or null if none
Returns:
the created item handle or null if this item type is an invalid item type whose corresponding instance class is not an item class.

createItemHandle

IItemHandle createItemHandle(java.lang.Object origin,
                             UUID itemId,
                             UUID optionalStateId)
Creates a new item handle of this item type, item id, and optional state id. The result records the item type, item id, and state if supplied. Method will also assign the given origin to the item handle.

Parameters:
origin - The item handle's origin; must not be null
itemId - the item id; must not be null
optionalStateId - the state id, or null if none
Returns:
the created item handle or null if this item type is an invalid item type whose corresponding instance class is not an item class.

allowsStateExtensions

boolean allowsStateExtensions()
Answers whether state extensions are allowed for this item type.

The component that declares the item type controls whether its item states can be augmented with state extensions (default: not allowed).

Returns:
true if state extensions are allowed for this item type; otherwise false
See Also:
IExtensibleItem

getQueryModel

IDynamicItemQueryModel getQueryModel()
Gets dynamic version of the root query model associated with this item type. Used for dynamic query building. Note that this is only needed when the static query model for an item type is not visible, for instance because of an inverted or soft dependency on another model. Generally, static query models should be used whenever they are visible and the types/properties are known at compile time. Note also that there are no API contracts regarding dynamic APIs - model objects may change shape, queryable properties, etc.

Returns:
a dynamic query model for this item type
